languages.text: "Молитва у священного Патента наполнила меня решимостью исполнить свою миссию... с поддержкой Вольного Торговца я вырву святыню из рук еретиков!"
"Praying before the Sacred Warrant has imbued me with the determination to fulfil my mission... With the support of the Rogue Trader, I will wrest the relic from the heretics' clutches!"
languages.original_text: "Молитва у священного Патента наполнила меня решимостью исполнить свою миссию... с поддержкой Вольного Торговца я вырву святыню из рук еретиков!"

traits.locale_text: "Praying before the Sacred Warrant has imbued me with the determination to fulfil my mission... With the support of the Rogue Trader, I will wrest the relic from the heretics' clutches!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Praying before the Sacred Warrant has imbued me with the determination to fulfil my mission... With the support of the Rogue Trader, I will wrest the relic from the heretics' clutches!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Praying before the Sacred Warrant has imbued me with the determination to fulfil my mission... With the support of the Rogue Trader, I will wrest the relic from the heretics' clutches!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “在神圣授状前祈祷，这让我内心充满了完成使命的决心……有了行商浪人的支持，我必将从异端手中夺回圣物！”
languages.original_text: "Praying before the Sacred Warrant has imbued me with the determination to fulfil my mission... With the support of the Rogue Trader, I will wrest the relic from the heretics' clutches!"

traits.locale_text: “在神圣许可证前祈祷，这让我内心充满了完成使命的决心……有了行商浪人的支持，我必将从异端手中夺回圣物！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Prier devant la lettre de marque m'a remplie de détermination... Avec l'aide {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, j'accomplirai ma mission et arracherai la relique des griffes des hérétiques ! »
languages.original_text: "Praying before the Sacred Warrant has imbued me with the determination to fulfil my mission... With the support of the Rogue Trader, I will wrest the relic from the heretics' clutches!"

traits.locale_text: « Prier devant la lettre de marque m'a remplie de détermination... Avec l'aide {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, j'accomplirai ma mission et arracherai la relique des griffes des hérétiques ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Al rezar ante la sagrada Patente, me siento llena de determinación de cumplir mi deber. Con apoyo de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, ¡arrancaré la reliquia de manos de los herejes!».
languages.original_text: "Praying before the Sacred Warrant has imbued me with the determination to fulfil my mission... With the support of the Rogue Trader, I will wrest the relic from the heretics' clutches!"

traits.locale_text: «Al rezar ante la sagrada Patente, me siento llena de determinación de cumplir mi deber. Con apoyo de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, ¡arrancaré la reliquia de manos de los herejes!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「私は祈り、聖務を果たす決意を神聖令状によってかみしめた…自由開拓者を援護し、異端者どもの掌中から遺物を取り戻す！」
languages.original_text: "Praying before the Sacred Warrant has imbued me with the determination to fulfil my mission... With the support of the Rogue Trader, I will wrest the relic from the heretics' clutches!"

traits.locale_text: 「私は祈り、聖務を果たす決意を神聖令状によってかみしめた…自由開拓者を援護し、異端者どもの掌中から遺物を取り戻す！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Durch das Gebet vor dem heiligen Handelsbrief habe ich die Entschlossenheit erlangt, meine Mission zu erfüllen ... Mit der Unterstützung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} werde ich das Relikt den Klauen der Ketzer entreißen!"
languages.original_text: "Praying before the Sacred Warrant has imbued me with the determination to fulfil my mission... With the support of the Rogue Trader, I will wrest the relic from the heretics' clutches!"

traits.locale_text: "Durch das Gebet vor dem heiligen Handelsbrief habe ich die Entschlossenheit erlangt, meine Mission zu erfüllen ... Mit der Unterstützung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} werde ich das Relikt den Klauen der Ketzer entreißen!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Praying before the Sacred Warrant has imbued me with the determination to fulfil my mission... With the support of the Rogue Trader, I will wrest the relic from the heretics' clutches!"

languages.text: "Kutsal Ruhsatname önünde duaya kapanmak, bana vazifemi yerine getirebilmem için gereken kararlılığı aşıladı... Hür Tacir'in desteğiyle emaneti, kâfirlerin pençelerinden kurtaracağım!"
languages.original_text: "Praying before the Sacred Warrant has imbued me with the determination to fulfil my mission... With the support of the Rogue Trader, I will wrest the relic from the heretics' clutches!"
